pr_title: HDDS-3815. Avoid buffer copy in ContainerCommandRequestProto.

timeline.message: HDDS-3815. Avoid buffer copy in ContainerCommandRequestProto.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                final int i = 4 + bytes.substring(0, Integer.BYTES)
          
          
            
                final int i = Integer.BYTES + bytes.substring(0, Integer.BYTES)
